text: Helen Elizabeth McCrory (17 August 1968 - 16 April 2021)Births, Marriages & Deaths Index of England & Wales, 1916â€“2005.; at ancestry.com was a British actress. She was known for Narcissa Malfoy in the Harry Potter movies and for her role as Polly Gray in Peaky Blinders. McCrory played Cherie Blair in both The Queen (2006) and The Special Relationship (2010). She starred as Clair Dowar in the James Bond movie Skyfall (2012). == Life == Helen McCrory was born in London. Her father is Scottish and her mother is Welsh. McCrory was married to Damian Lewis and they had two children. === Death === McCrory died of breast cancer at her home in London on 16 April 2021, aged 52. ==Sources== Category:1968 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in London Category:British movie actors Category:British television actors Category:British stage actors Category:British voice actors Category:Actors from London Category:Deaths from breast cancer
title: Helen McCrory
